title: Credit Suisse doubles third-quarter net profit
text:
Credit Suisse doubles third-quarter net profit

Stock Markets 24 minutes ago (Oct 30, 2019 02:31AM ET)

ZURICH (Reuters) - Credit Suisse (S: ) on Wednesday said it had more than doubled its third-quarter net profit to 881 million Swiss francs ($886.94 million), as it boosted revenues in its flagship wealth management business and in trading and saw gains from the transfer of its InvestLab fund platform to Allfunds Group. The 108% net profit rise put earnings ahead of expectations in the bank's own consensus forecast for 751 million francs. "We have continued, in a challenging environment, to grow our wealth management franchises, increasing our revenues and gathering record net new assets of 72 billion Swiss francs across the Group year to date," Chief Executive Tidjane Thiam said in a statement.

Credit Suisse doubles third-quarter net profit
description: Credit Suisse doubles third-quarter net profit
